about_the_game:
Whether you're raiding lost arks or exploring doomed temples, this pack of twenty four background music tracks by composer Joel Steudler has you covered! Rousing orchestral themes and haunting native flutes set the stage for a jungle journey, while thirty Music Events and forty Sound Effects color the audio environment. Don't forget your mosquito nets!

This pack contains:

  • 24 Music Tracks for Battle, Dungeons, Towns, and Themes
  • 30 Music Events for adding emotion to important moments
  • 40 SFX
  • .m4a, .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice.

Tracklist:

1 - Battle - Dancing in Flames
2 - Battle - Death Defying
3 - Battle - No Way Out
4 - Battle - Peril Aplenty
5 - Battle - Temple Tussle
6 - Battle - Warrior Spirit
7 - Dungeon - Burial Chambers
8 - Dungeon - Catacomb Crawler
9 - Dungeon - Shadow Path
10 - Dungeon - Subterranean Maze
11 - Dungeon - Temple Tresspassers
12 - Dungeon - Unearthed Tomb
12 - Theme - Ancient Empire
13 - Theme - Lost Love Found
14 - Theme - March to Adventure Fanfare
15 - Theme - March to Adventure
16 - Theme - Ritual Rites
17 - Theme - Unwilling Sacrifice
18 - Theme - Victory and Onward
19 - Town - Base Camp
20 - Town - Hidden Village
21 - Town - Imperial Temple
22 - Town - Mystic Glade
23 - Town - Trading Post
24 - Town - Village of the Sun

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Grand Adventure Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Grand Adventure Music Pack - $34.99

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Grand Adventure Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: Delve into dangerous depths and giant jungles on an auditory adventure with these twenty four tracks of bold background music by composer Joel Steudler! Highlight daring discoveries with thirty new Music Events and enhance the environment with forty sound effects!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
